statements: UPDATE InfluencerContentTracking SET likes = 150, shares = 30, comments = 20 WHERE influencer_id = 1 AND brand_id = 5
UPDATE InfluencerContentTracking SET reach = 1000, likes = 200, post_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE brand_id = 2 AND influencer_id = 3
UPDATE InfluencerContentTracking SET likes=150, comments=50 WHERE influencer_id=123 AND brand_id=456 AND post_date='2022-01-01'
UPDATE InfluencerContentTracking SET shares=1000, reach=5000 WHERE brand_id=789 AND social_media_platform='Instagram' AND post_date='2022-02-15'
UPDATE BrandInfluencerContent SET reach = 500, impact = 200 WHERE brand_id = 1 AND influencer_id = 3;
UPDATE SocialMediaPlatform SET followers = 100000, engagement_rate = 5.75 WHERE platform_id = 2;
UPDATE BrandInfluencerContent SET reach = 100, impact = 50 WHERE influencer_id = 101 AND content_id = 201;
UPDATE SocialMediaPlatform SET engagement_rate = 7.50, followers = 15000 WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE Influencer SET followers = 5000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Brand SET budget = 15000.00, industry = 'Fashion' WHERE brand_id = 3;
UPDATE Influencer SET followers = followers + 10000, name = 'New Influencer Name' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Post SET likes = likes * 2, shares = shares + 500, comments = comments - 100 WHERE post_id = 10;
UPDATE brand_info SET brand_name = 'New Brand Name', industry = 'Technology' WHERE brand_id = 1;
UPDATE influencer SET follower_count = 50000 WHERE influencer_id = 2;
UPDATE brand_info SET industry='Fashion', social_media_handles='@fashionbrand' WHERE brand_id=1;
UPDATE influencer SET follower_count=10000, social_media_platform='Instagram' WHERE influencer_id=2;
UPDATE Brand SET industry = 'Fashion' WHERE brand_id = 1;
UPDATE Influencer SET followers_count = 15000, influencer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE influencer_id = 5;
UPDATE Brand SET industry = 'Fashion' WHERE brand_id = 1;
UPDATE Influencer SET followers_count = 100000, platform = 'Instagram' WHERE influencer_id = 2;
